PresentationTable.name: Calculated Facts
PresentationTable.Description: Following folders contain various metrics directly calculated by OBIEE server.

PresentationColumn.name: Actual Unit Price
PresentationColumn.Description: This logical object calculates the Actua Unit Price by dividing Revenue by Units.

PresentationColumn.name: Avg Order Size
PresentationColumn.Description: This logical object calculates the Actual Average Oder Size by dividing Total Revenue by number of Distinct Orders.

PresentationColumn.name: # of Orders
PresentationColumn.Description: This metric counts the distinct number of orders in the query population. The aggregation is a Count Distinct aggregation

PresentationColumn.name: # of Products with Orders
PresentationColumn.Description: This metric counts the distinct number of Products in the query population. The aggregation is a Count Distinct aggregation

PresentationColumn.name: # of Offices with Orders
PresentationColumn.Description: This metric counts the distinct number of orders in the query population. The aggregation is a Count Distinct aggregation

PresentationColumn.name: Full Month Revenue
PresentationColumn.Description: Shows the full month sum of revenue.

PresentationColumn.name: Full Quarter Revenue
PresentationColumn.Description: Shows the full quarter sum of revenue.

PresentationColumn.name: All Offices Revenue
PresentationColumn.Description: Shows the sum of revenue for all offices.

PresentationColumn.name: All Products Revenue
PresentationColumn.Description: Shows the sum of revenue for all products.
